ingredients: 1 cup basmati rice, 1 tablespoon coconut oil, 1 teaspoon butter,   +   1/4 cup flaked coconut, 1 cup coconut milk, 1 cup chicken broth,   salt, to taste, 1  lime, zested and juiced,   ground black pepper, to taste
nutrition: Total Fat 37g 47%, Saturated Fat 32g 159%, Cholesterol 5mg 2%, Sodium 56mg 2%, Total Carbohydrate 85g 31%, Dietary Fiber 4g 14%, Total Sugars 4g, Protein 10g, Vitamin C 11mg 56%, Calcium 42mg 3%, Iron 5mg 26%, Potassium 323mg 7%
